name: IVOR
description:
Trapped, comatose, and left to rot, THE DRENGR awaited the end of his unjust-penance.

Released by an unknown force, he finds the Al-Father has risen an army of the dead.

He had sealed The Drengr away for this purpose. Now, he's pissed.

==========================================================

IVOR is a fast-paced shooter set in a Norse-inspired world. Find brutal weapons and rip through your foes. Keep moving, as death comes swiftly to those who hesitate.

**This game was created for E1M1 Magazine's 2nd game jam. The prompt was to create a retro shooter in an uncommon setting, so we decided to go with this Norse-inspired world. IVOR was created in Unity 2021.2. The game will be available on November 30th, 2021!**

==========================================================
Credits:

Programming: Brian Maresso
Art & Level Design: Brandon Hanabarger
Music: Tigerblood Studio
Voice Acting: Kendall Wade
